alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 04 at 8:16PM CDT until July 04 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 445 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL KANSAS JEWELL MITCHELL OSBORNE PHILLIPS ROOKS SMITH IN NEBRASKA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL NEBRASKA YORK IN SOUTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA ADAMS CLAY FILLMORE FRANKLIN FURNAS HAMILTON HARLAN KEARNEY NUCKOLLS PHELPS THAYER WEBSTER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALMA, ARAPAHOE, AURORA, BEAVER CITY, BELLAIRE, BELOIT, BLADEN, BLUE HILL, BOSTWICK, BURR OAK, CAMBRIDGE, CAMPBELL, CLAY CENTER, CODELL, DESHLER, DOWNS, EDGAR, EXETER, FAIRFIELD, FAIRMONT, FRANKLIN, GENEVA, HARVARD, HASTINGS, HEBRON, HILDRETH, HOLDREGE, HOLLINGER, INAVALE, IONIA, JEWELL, KENSINGTON, MANKATO, MINDEN, NELSON, ORLEANS, OSBORNE, OXFORD, PHILLIPSBURG, PLAINVILLE, RED CLOUD, ROSEMONT, SMITH CENTER, STOCKTON, SUPERIOR, SUTTON, AND YORK.
